name: The Greatest Race
description:
Can you outlast the other sperm, avoid all the hazards and be the first to reach the egg?

Use A and D to rotate the sperm in the direction you want to travel.

This is my first gamejam and first game that I have made. I made this whilst working a full-time job and looking after a little 4-month old baby.

I hope you enjoy my first project :D
